translation.supprimer_joueurs_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to delete all players already registered?

translation.valider_score_impossible_coupe_multichan: En {{typeTournoi}} le score doit indiquer un gagnant
translation.retour_liste_matchs_bouton: Return to the list of games
translation.supprimer_tournoi_actuel_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to delete the current tournament n°{{id}}?
translation.nombre_points_victoire_tiret: - Nombre de points pour la victoire :
translation.regle_equipes_differentes_tiret: - Ne jamais former les mêmes équipes :
translation.regle_adversaires_tiret: - Les joueurs peuvent avoir le même adversaire au maximum :
translation.regle_speciaux_tiret: - Ne jamais mettre des joueurs du même type (enfant, tireur, pointeur) dans la même équipe :
translation.description_melee_demelee:
Les joueurs sont solitaires.
Les matchs peuvent se dérouler en tête-à-tête, doublettes ou triplettes.
Possibilité de compléter un match avec une triplette ou tête à tête.
translation.description_melee:
Les joueurs sont en équipes fixes.
Les matchs peuvent se dérouler en tête-à-tête, doublettes ou triplettes.
translation.description_championnat: Players meet only once during the tournament.
translation.description_coupe:
A random 1st round then qualification if victory otherwise elimination from the tournament.

Currently unavailable: pool phase
translation.description_multi_chances: Players compete against other players who have also won or lost their previous match
translation.regle_adversaires_modal_informations_tou: Players may have the same opponent at most:
translation.regle_speciaux_modal_informations_tourno: Players of the same type (child, shooter, pointer) are incompatible:
translation.erreur_generation_options: The generation cannot work with the selected options.
translation.erreur_generation_options_regles: You can try disabling the option to never form the same teams or to prevent players from meeting too often.
translation.erreur_generation_joueurs_speciaux: There are too many children or shooters or pointers to apply the option to have them play separately.
translation.erreur_generation_regle_equipes: It seems too complicated to never play identical teams
translation.joueurs_enfants_explication: Child players are players who cannot play on the same team
translation.equipes_trop_joueurs: Some teams have too many players
translation.nombre_equipe_multiple_2: The number of teams must be a multiple of 2
translation.configuration_impossible_coupe: In cup, the number of teams must be 4, 8, 16, ...
translation.configuration_impossible_multichances: In multi-chances, the number of teams must be a multiple of 8
translation.equipe_doublette_multiple_4: With doubles teams, the number of players must be a multiple of 4
translation.equipe_triplette_multiple_6: With triples teams, the number of players must be a multiple of 6
translation.tete_a_tete_multiple_2: In singles, the number of players must be a multiple of 2
translation.champ_invalide: One of the fields is not valid
translation.indiquer_nombre_points_victoire: Indicate number of points to win:
translation.choix_regle_speciaux: Choice of players of the same type (child, shooter, pointer) in different teams
translation.options_regle_speciaux: Never put players of the same type (child, shooter, pointer) in the same team
translation.choix_regle_equipes: Choose never to form the same teams
translation.options_regle_adversaires: Players can have the same opponent at most:
translation.options_terrains_explications: Before starting the tournament, create a list of terrain that will be assigned to the matches
translation.supprimer_donnees_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to delete all data (player lists, old tournaments, terrain, etc.)?
translation.envie_aider_traduction: Want to help with the translation?

translation.mise_a_jour_modal_texte_2: If it doesn't appear yet, try again later
translation.confirmer_uncheck_modal_texte: Are you sure you want to uncheck the box?
translation.chargement_publicite: Please wait, an advertisement will appear. It covers the costs of the application.
translation.mdp_non_identique: Must be the same as the 1st password
translation.mdp_consignes: Must contain at least 10 characters including 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number, 1 special character
translation.accepte_termes_conditions: I agree to the terms and conditions
translation.confirmation_email_text_1: A confirmation email has just been sent to:
translation.confirmation_email_text_2: Please click on the link in the email.
translation.choix_complement_title_1: The number of registered players is not a multiple of {{nbModulo}}. It is therefore necessary to choose the distribution of additional players.
translation.choix_complement_title_2: You can choose that the last match of each round will be a:
translation.quitter_tournoi_question: Do you want to leave the tournament? You can always reload it later.
